testsuite.name: Cart Functionality
testsuite.system-out:
@web @cart @positive Scenario: Add item to cart # src/test/resources/features/web/cart.feature:5 Given User is logged in with valid credentials # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_logged_in() When User adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.user_adds_item(java.lang.String) And User navigates to the cart page # web.steps.CartSteps.user_navigates_to_cart() Then "Sauce Labs Backpack" should be in the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.item_should_be_in_cart(java.lang.String)
@web @cart @positive Scenario: Remove item from cart # src/test/resources/features/web/cart.feature:12 Given User is logged in with valid credentials # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_logged_in() And User adds "Sauce Labs Bike Light" to the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.user_adds_item(java.lang.String) When User navigates to the cart page # web.steps.CartSteps.user_navigates_to_cart() And User removes "Sauce Labs Bike Light" from the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.user_removes_item(java.lang.String) Then "Sauce Labs Bike Light" should not be in the cart # web.steps.CartSteps.item_should_not_be_in_cart(java.lang.String)
